summary: This bill, H.R. 2187, aims to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to remove tax credits for offshore wind facilities located in inland navigable or coastal waters of the United States. It specifically targets the production tax credit (Section 45) and the investment tax credit (Section 48 and 48E), defining 'disqualified offshore wind facility'. The changes would apply to energy produced and property placed in service after December 31, 2025.
